attributes.action: Cut the amount of profits any oil company can make to 2 billion pounds for 5 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If we continue to increase fuel costs at the rate we are, we will all end up out of work.
Before this happens I suggest we all take a week off work as from 1st of July 2008 and also a week off spending on foods this simply means taking a week with our families or by ourselves, whatever we like to do "lets do it"!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
